column5: i was wondering if anyone new where i could pickup a set of OR18 clips for my boards. Can't seem to find any in Ottawa  thanks
Sail and LeBaron in Ottawa should carry them. A quick phone call may answer your question.
I have 5 of them left, they move this time of year.  Can have them to you in a day or two.  eTackle.ca

Great to hear tried Sail and Lebarons but only carry the OR 16 and will not special order, well maybe Lebarons but the stuff never comes in ( or atleast for me)  Was just online do you ship to PO Boxes or does it have to be an address, i need two of them  cheers   chuck
po box is no problem chuck, will send them express. Phil
Great will be going online to place a order  cheers  chuck
